data.eml:eml: Redescription of Chrysidea pumiloides Zimmermann, 1956, and description of three new species of Chrysidea from Madagascar (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mita, Toshiharu, Rosa, Paolo (2019): Redescription of Chrysidea pumiloides Zimmermann, 1956, and description of three new species of Chrysidea from Madagascar (Hymenoptera: Chrysididae). European Journal of Taxonomy 564: 1-20, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.564
